channel.title: Customs Help
channel.description:
OK guys, i added lots of customs, it took me forever...but now, when i logged on spawned them(everything went fine till this point) I clicked wear, and it went to my weapon slot, and looked all glitchy....does anyone know how to fix this ? plz help
Owner Of Elitescape,
Owner Will
